TopicTitle: more SRB'S and in-built procedural feul tanks and more

Articles.Content:
more srb's would be better like a 3.75 meter inline SRB for the begin stage and a SRB for probes let this game have procudural fuel tanks in stock for much more versitillity and procudural engine's to make jet engine's ion engine's nuclear engine's and normal engine's and solar panels would make this game so much more awesome

Edited October 19, 2014 by tetryds

Hello, I am sorry but general "more parts" are on the What not to suggest list.

Please describe better the parts you are suggesting, and create a new topic for that.

There are several mods that adds more parts, I suggest taking a look at them: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/35-Add-on-Releases
